column5: Watched fish tv today,, and they had a shot of a double rainbow and it was the same pic that i had when we were there in june 2010 ,exact same spot and pretty sure more than a coincidence ,so when i watched the show again ,when they showed the shots of lodge(we stayed at lookoutpoint camp right beside where they were at auld reekie) they had a boat going out ,i stopped the pvr and zoomed in ,, sure enough it was one of our boats going out.. good for a laugh..
Very cool!  You going to go after royalties??? Haha.
